description: Implemented centralized order normalization service and fixed TypeScript errors across MemberArea and BusinessDashboard components.
changes: NORMALIZATION: Created centralized order normalization service to handle divergent order schemas (Stripe vs Bank Transfer).
NORMALIZATION: Extended NormalizedOrder with estimatedCompletion, deliveryDate, trackingNumber, courier, address, and buildUpdates fields.
MEMBER AREA: Replaced all legacy helper functions (getOrderDisplayId, getOrderDisplayTotal, getItemName) with normalized field access.
MEMBER AREA: Fixed date sorting to handle undefined orderDate values.
MEMBER AREA: Removed ActivityTimeline placeholder component.
BUSINESS DASHBOARD: Fixed Contentful TypeScript constraints with proper EntrySkeletonType interfaces.
APP: Fixed lazy import for MemberArea component.
BUILD: All TypeScript errors resolved, production build successful.
